alert.note: Alert for Northern Jackson; Southern Jackson (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 28 at 8:50AM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Jackson County through 930 AM CDT... At 850 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Vancleave, or 11 miles northwest of Escatawpa, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... St. Martin, Escatawpa, Wade, Latimer, Big Point, Hurley, Vancleave, Gulf Hills and Hickory Hills. This includes Interstate 10 in Mississippi between mile markers 48 and 53. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
